meanings.sent1: She brushed her barnet until it shone in the sun.
meanings.sent2: His barnet was a mess after playing in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The bird tried to build a nest with strands of barnet it found.
meanings.sent4: Her barnet was a wild tangle of curls, like a forest at dusk.
meanings.sent5: The barnet of the old man was as white as snow, a crown of wisdom.

meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful barnet for the party.
meanings.sent2: The barnet she chose was elegant and sophisticated.
meanings.sent3: His barnet looked like a sculpture made of hair gel.
meanings.sent4: The barnet she sported was a work of art, turning heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The barnet of curls framed her face like a halo of silk.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a wig.
meanings.sent1: She put on a fancy barnet for the costume party.
meanings.sent2: The actor wore a barnet to transform into the character.
meanings.sent3: The barnet she wore made her look like a different person.
meanings.sent4: His barnet was so realistic, no one could tell it was a wig.
meanings.sent5: The barnet she donned was a disguise fit for a spy.
